price: Na ambao wanaiogopa adhabu itokayo kwa Mola wao Mlezi.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: Na wale wanao iogopa adhabu ya Mola wao Mlezi basi wanajikinga nayo wala hawajitii katika jambo la kuwaletea adhabu hiyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
